channel.title: Pimpscape - Pking - Problem
channel.description:
When someone dies on my pimpscape server, they sometimes dont spawn back in the bank. They just stay where they was last time and when they move they are in a safe zone because they are in bank, until they attack you it shows the proper posisition of the character.
Can someone help me out so it makes the character ALWAYS spwan inside the bank. Thanks.

item.title: Pimpscape - Pking - Problem
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

Yeah thats what Im doing at the moment, this is annoying as well because if you click on the person dieing when he loggs out you, also get logged out aswell. But is this because I have entered disconnected = true; in the wrong place? I have entered it here… (Right at the bottom)

public void youdied() { for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 10000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) { try { if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 10000) { //createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); //createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]); deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]); } } catch(Exception e) { } } removeAllItems(); for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) { try { int item = playerEquipment[r]; if((item > 0) && (item < 10000)) { remove(item, r); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("ERROR: Removing Equipment"); } } for(int rr=0; rr<playerItems.length; rr++) { try { if(playerItems[rr] > 0 && playerItems[rr] < 10000) { //createItem(currentX,currentY,playerItems[rr]-1); ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[rr], KillerId, false); //createGroundItem(playerItems[rr]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[i]); deleteItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr]); } } catch(Exception e) { } } removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; disconnected = true; }

Does it work the same if i put it here…

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape - Pking - Problem
item.dc:creator: @money67 money67
item.description:
@money67 wrote:

I think i have the solution…
Step 1 Search for public boolean ApplyDead()
But Click twice when you search for it.
It should look like this… }*/ public boolean ApplyDead() { if (IsDeadTimer == false) { actionAmount++; actionTimer = 0; ResetAttack(); ResetAttackNPC(); pEmote = 2820; IsDeadTimer = true; ApplyDead(); }

Step 2 Under if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
add this disconnected = true;

It should look like this }*/ public boolean ApplyDead() { if (IsDeadTimer == false) { disconnected = true; actionAmount++; actionTimer = 0; ResetAttack(); ResetAttackNPC(); pEmote = 2820; IsDeadTimer = true; ApplyDead(); }

Save and compile

This will make it so when you die, you get disconnected and so it doesn’t
look like you’r no clipping
(It laggs you out to reset you)

Read full topic
